comments:
Using latest milestones, I get a nullpointer exception halfway through parsing my project in three different files.
It prevents the index from being built.
Any idea what causes this issue ?

There were a lot of issues with indexing templates in M6.  It would be great if you could check if you get any exceptions with a more recent build.

http://download.eclipse.org/tools/cdt/builds/4.0.0/index.html

I tried the latest snapshot and everything is fixed. Thanks a lot.
Call hierarchies are working!
Setting to milestone 4.0 so we can generate a report of all bugs fixed in 4.0.
